frontmatter.title: Building a 20TB Raspberry Pi Network Attached Storage with Nextcloud and Ubuntu 24
frontmatter.summary: I’ll walk you through building a powerful and scalable 20TB network-attached storage (NAS) system using a Raspberry Pi and Nextcloud. Learn how I configured my Raspberry Pi running Ubuntu 24 to create an accessible, secure, and efficient cloud storage solution. With open-source software and a few components, you can turn your Raspberry Pi into a personal cloud storage system that rivals commercial alternatives, accessible from anywhere in the world.
